articles.title: Tales of Kenzera: Zau studio, founded by Assassin’s Creed Origins actor, lay off staff less than three months after debut game

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
There's no genre like the open world for inducing choice paralysis, so it's fitting that I've been agonising over how to begin this irregular article series on open world games for months. I have a lot of material, oodles of interviews with developers of all shapes and sizes - big shops like Remedy and CD Projekt, smaller studios like Ace Team and Awaceb, all holding forth on such topics as whether Elden Ring or Zelda did bandit camps better, and how you make a forest feel endless. There is so much you could talk about, so many trails heading off in all directions, but perhaps it's best to begin with the more personal and superficial question that inspired this investigation: how did the open world game get so boring? 
 
Read more
articles.title: How the checklist conquered the open world, from Morrowind to Skyrim

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
We've had the enshittification of Google, Facebook and the public internet at large, now for the enshittification of GTA Online. What do you mean, "it was enshittified to start with"? Take it to the comments please, because first I need to tell you about the latest GTA Online update, which allows you to collect cash accumulated in safes, request vehicles and replenish ammo using your in-game phone - but only if you pay up $8 or $7 a month for a GTA+ subscription, which is currently not available on PC.
 Read more
articles.title: GTA Online update pops a quality-of-life feature behind the GTA+ paywall, making it unavailable on PC

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
You might have seen that £10 will go a long way in the Steam summer sale, but let me do you one better. Indie game store Itch.io has begun its own summer sale, and for those willing to delve into its rainbow-coloured heap of throwaway toys and fun experiments, plenty of deals await.
Read more
articles.title: Steam isn't the only place having a summer sale, as Itch.io launches its own sunny deals

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Wuthering Waves, that recent gacha RPG of anime styling and impenetrable jargonblasting, just didn’t work on the Steam Deck when it launched in May. It also doesn’t work right now. But for one brief, debatably glorious day on June 29th, it did. And thus, Deck owners who’d persevered through a slightly fiddly installation process (explained here by YouTubesmith Deck Wizard) could finally take their first joyous steps into Wuthering Waves like a David Hasselhoff-buoyed East German in 1989.
Unlike the Hoff, it wouldn’t last. Within hours, Steam Deck players were being booted back out of the game by a hitherto-unseen anti-cheat failure. What gives? Or gave?
Read more
articles.title: Wuthering Waves was unleashed on the Steam Deck, but only for one day

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Nexon's free-to-play looter-shooter The First Descendant - "Nexon's Warframe", as the wags are calling it on Steam - launched this week and has encountered a few snags and snaffaroos, including beta rewards not showing up, Easy Anti-Cheat not running correctly, frame-rate drops for people who downloaded in advance of release, and players finding their merry way to servers where no other players exist. Nexon are even now patching the game, and have plied players with in-game bonuses and cosmetics as an apology for the inconvenience.
 Read more
articles.title: Nexon say sorry for The First Descendant launch bugs and performance issues with free cosmetics and boosters

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Alongside the usual standard and nightmare modes, upcoming RPG Dragon Age: The Veilguard (née Dreadwolf) will ship with a fully tweakable set of difficulty options called ‘Unbound’, letting you customise everything from parry timings to invincibility.
 Read more
articles.title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard’s customisable difficulties look genuinely great for accessibility

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
A UK employment tribunal have ordered Star Citizen developer Cloud Imperium to pay around £27,748 - approximately $35,230 - in compensation for discriminating against former senior programmer Paul Ah-Thion, who was dismissed in 2022 after his requests to work from home following an office move were denied.
 Read more
articles.title: Star Citizen devs Cloud Imperium fined for discriminating against autistic programmer over work-from-home request

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
The tabletop equivalent of “buying books and reading them are two different hobbies” is surely the difference between buying sexy tabletop RPG manuals and actually dragging your mates on to Discord for a few hours to stumble your way through a module. It’s the dogeared Fighting Fantasy from a carboot sale kid in me, I think. Something about reading worldbuilding snippets organised into numbered tables just hits in a way a novel doesn’t. Such tantalising ephemera is the name of the game in Microprose-published CrossOver: Roll For Initiative. It’s a wave defense where you play match-3 to collect dice, then spend them on fireballs and mace swings to stop tiny bastards from marauding all over your actual character sheet and attacking your stats.
 
Read more
articles.title: Your paper RPG character sheet itself is under attack in CrossOver: Roll For Initiative

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Lukáš Kotek)
articles.description: Cítili jste někdy nostalgii nad starými operačními systémy? Podíváme se na to, jak v moderním linuxovém prostředí spustit DOS a vrátit se do světa, kde vás neotravovaly stovky aplikací a mohli jste pracovat.
articles.title: DOS v moderním Linuxu? Nastartujte QEMU a v něm FreeDOS

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Sonda do světa otevřeného softwaru. Dnes si vyzkoušíme chatovací platformu s umělou inteligencí, vytvoříme si kartičky pro trénování paměti, uděláme si pořádek v projektech a úkolech a trochu si projdeme luxy, kandely a lumeny.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (17. 7. 2024): umělá inteligence s otevřeným kódem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Grafické režimy karty CGA pravděpodobně nikoho neohromí. Zajímavější jsou z pohledu programátora režimy textové, protože ty je možné konfigurací čipu Motorola 6845 přeprogramovat tak, že vznikne pseudografický režim 160×100.
articles.title: Textové režimy grafické karty CGA a řadič displeje Motorola 6845

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Projekt Peppermint OS představil novou edici Loaded, která má nabídnout více aplikací a funkcí hned po instalaci. Red Hat se chce postupně zbavit zavaděče Grub a nahradit ho svým vlastním.
articles.title: Peppermint OS má novou edici, Red Hat se zbavuje Grubu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Monika Kutějová)
articles.description: V tomto vydání Postřehů se podíváme na zabavení farmy ruských botů, vylepšený malwarový arzenál čínské skupiny, zranitelnost Veeam nebo twitterovou přestřelku a špaddtné zabezpečení klienta aplikace Signal.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: Signal pod palbou a lepší arzenál APT41

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Hlášení otáček ventilátorů u Intel Arc, XWayland 24.1.1 s opravami chybnová verze knihovny libAVIF, OBS Studio 30.2 s kódováním přes NVENC včetně AV1, Thunderbird 128 rychlejší, s upraveným uživatelským rozhraním a více Rustu v kódu.
articles.title: Thunderbird 128 s řadou vylepšení, nové OBS Studio 30.2

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Implementace Intel Performance Limit Reasons, senzory na Asus ProArt X670E-CREATOR WIFI, lepší podpora ARM Lenovo Yoga C630 WOS, atomický zápis u NVMe a SCSI, podsvícení klávesnice na dalších Apple Mac.
articles.title: Novinky pro Linux 6.11: nejen atomický zápis na NVMe a throttlování CPU Intel

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Dnes se ještě jednou budeme zabývat programováním a kreslením na původním IBM PC a grafické kartě CGA. Ukážeme si práci s barvovou paletou a taktéž operace, které je nutné provádět při vykreslování jednotlivých pixelů.
articles.title: Hrátky s barvovou paletou a vykreslení jednotlivých pixelů kartou CGA

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jiří Sluka)
articles.description: Dnes se podíváme ne pomocníka pro práci s objekty v Kubernetes, vyzkoušíme osobního digitální asistenta pro organizaci práce a nakonec budeme analyzovat data ze sledování pohybu očí.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (10. 7. 2024): udělejte si pořádek v práci i v Kubernetes

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Ve třetím článku o programování her a dem pro IBM PC se „slavnou“ kartou CGA se zaměříme na důležité operace: přístup do obrazové paměti, využití vertikálního zatemnění pro vykreslování a volání blokových instrukcí pro zápis i přenos dat.
articles.title: Struktura obrazové paměti grafické karty CGA, blokové přenosy a základy optimalizace

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Společnosti Mozilla a Meta vytvořily PPA (Privacy-Preserving Attribution). Jde o způsob, jak zadavatelé reklam mohou zjistit, jestli jejich reklama funguje. Přitom se dbá, aby nebylo sledováním narušeno soukromí a anonymita uživatelů.
articles.title: Firefox 128 má ve výchozím stavu zapnuté anonymní sledování PPA

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Linuxová distribuce Solus postavená na vlastním balíčkovacím systém PiSi / eopkg a primárně desktopovém prostředí Budgie, ohlásila konec podpory AppArmoru. Ten skončí v Solusu s rokem 2024 a nadále tudíž distribuce nebude schopna nabízet plnohodnotný běh Snapů a pro situace, kdy věc nemá v repozitářích, bude spoléhat na Flatpak.
articles.title: Solus Linux končí s AppArmor a Snap, sází na Flatpak

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Michael Søndergaard ze Spectral Compute ohlásil vydání beta verze SCALE, toolkitu pro nativní běh CUDA programů na AMD Radeonech. SCALE umí sestavovat binárky, které jsou napsány v CUDA, ale poběží i na konkurenčních GPU, výhledově i jiných než od AMD. Kompatibilita je zajištěna včetně věcí jako podpora inline PTX a specifických úprav C++, které jsou v  nvcc.
articles.title: CUDA na Radeonech: GPGPU toolkit SCALE má beta verzi

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Projekt Wine vydal novou vývojovou verzi 9.13. Přináší podporu načítání Windows ovladačů ODBC, více datových struktur user32 ve sdílené paměti a zase o něco více přepsaný kód enginu  CMD.EXE.
articles.title: Vývojová verze Wine 9.13 s opravou pro Photoshop CC 2024

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Cloudflare vydalo zprávu o bezpečnosti za rok 2024 (od května 2023 do března 2024). Sledovali například několik CVE a jak jsou zneužívány. V případě CVE-2024–27198 (obejití autentizace v JetBrains TeamCity) uplynulo od zveřejnění PoC a prvního zaznamenaného zneužití pouhých 22 minut.
articles.title: Útočníci použijí PoC do 22 minut

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: V roce 2017 porazila umělá inteligence AlphaGo nejlepšího hráče světa. Loni pak člověk porazil open source AI KataGo. Používal při tom „triky“, na které neskočí ani začínající lidský hráč Go. Tyto „triky“ odhalila kalifornská firma FAIR AI, která vytvořila umělou inteligenci útočící na KataGo.
articles.title: Vylepšit AI hrající Go může být složitější, než se zdálo

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: johny)
articles.description: V Jave 23 pribudla možnosť používania primitívnych typov pre syntax priraďovania vzorov (pattern matching). Novinku formálne špecifikuje dokument Primitive Types in Patterns, instanceof, and switch.
articles.title: Primitívne typy v priraďovaní vzorov v Jave

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Linus Torvalds ve čtvrtek v rozhovoru pro Mastery Learning hovořil o RISC-V. Řekl, že se domnívá, že udělá stejné chyby jako x86 a ARM. Nicméně vývoj nového hardware se stává jednodušším, než tomu bylo v minulosti.
articles.title: Linus Torvalds říká, že RISC-V udělá stejné chyby jako x86 a ARM

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Nadace GNOME oznámila, že výkonná ředitelka Holly Millionová ke konci července odstoupí z funkce a dočasně ji nahradí Richard Littauer. Současná ředitelka nebyla ve své funkci ani celý rok a říká, že odchází dokončit své doktorské studium psychologie. Rada nadace chce začít hledat stálého výkonného ředitele po skončení konference GUADEC, která se koná od 19. do 24. července.
articles.title: Nadace GNOME mění výkonného ředitele

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Linus Torvalds uvolnil novou očekávanou verzi linuxového jádra s označením 6.10. Přináší nový ovladač Panthor DRM pro novější grafiky Arm Mali, přípravu pro grafiky Intel Xe2, lepší podporu AMD ROCm/AMDKFD pro malá APU Ryzen, podporu zobrazení pomocí GPU AMD na architektuře RISC-V díky FPU v režimu jádra RISC-V, nové doplňky pro AMD Zen 5, lepší výkon IO_uring zero-copy a rychlejší šifrování disků/souborů AES-XTS s moderními procesory Intel a AMD.
articles.title: Vyšlo jádro 6.10 s grafickým ovladačem Panthor a podporou Radeonu na RISC-V

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Chcete se stát odborníky na monitoring pomocí systému Zabbix? Nabízíme pětidenní kurz Zabbix, který probíhá online a je zaměřen na řešení praktických problémů. Kurz je dotován Úřadem práce, od kterého můžete získat až 82 % ceny kurzu. Kontaktujte naši kolegyni pavla.hettnerova@iinfo.cz.
articles.title: Pětidenní kurz Zabbix dotovaný Úřadem práce

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Jiří Brejcha na svém blogu ukázal postup, jak připojit k Raspberry Pi 5 Realtek RTL8126 s 5 gigabitovým ethernetem a cenou kolem 12 dolarů. Použitý je Iocrest 5 GbE adaptér ve formě M.2 s M-key. Připojí se do Raspberry Pi 5 pomocí například Pi M.2 HAT+.
articles.title: 5GBASE-T s Raspberry Pi 5

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Závažná zranitelnost CVE-2024–39929 byla objevena v MTA Exim.  Zranitelné jsou všechny verze do 4.97.1, oprava se objevila v 4.98-RC3, ale mezitím ve středu vyšla již ostrá verze 4.98.
articles.title: Závažná zranitelnost v Exim, aktualizujte na 4.98

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Obchod GOG.com má oficiálního klienta Galaxy pouze pro macOS a Windows. Ten sice funguje s Wine/Protonem, ale je tu také open source alternativa v Pythonu Minigalaxy. Také je možné použít Lutris či PlayOnLinux.
articles.title: Open source klient pro GOG Galaxy komunikaci: Comet

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: JavaScript, HTML a CSS jsou nepostradatelnou součástí každého webu. Tyto technologie jsou snadno pochopitelné a jednoduché webové stránky díky nim dokážeš vytvořit už za pár týdnů. Nepotřebuješ žádné předchozí znalosti, všechno tě naučíme v naší Front-end Developer Akademii během 14 týdnů.
articles.title: Staň se vývojářem front-endu během 14týdenní akademie (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Již v roce 2018 byla v dektopovém klientovi Signalu na Windows a macOS ohlášena bezpečnostní chyba. Zprávy ukládá klient do sice šifrované databáze SQLite, ale šifrovací klíč je uložen prostě v souboru %AppData%\Signal\config.json  ve Windows a ~/Library/Application Support/Signal/config.json v macOS. Signal problém nijak neřešil. Podle jejich slov neměl klíč k databázi být tajný a pokud útočník již má plný přístup k počítači, tak se Signal nemůže nijak bránit.
articles.title: Signal opravil bezpečnostní chybu desktopového klienta až po 6 letech a po skandálu na síti X

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Osmý ročník konference Ověřená řešení v sítích má zveřejněný program a letos se zaměří na nové trendy a možnosti využití svobodného i komerčního software v oblasti sítí a kybernetické bezpečnosti.
articles.title: Konference Ověřená řešení v sítích má program, proběhne 21. listopadu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Android používá linuxové jádro, konkrétně jeho verzi s dlouhodobou podporou (LTS), protože je pravidelně aktualizována o důležité opravy chyb a bezpečnostní záplaty. Od roku 2017 byla doba podpory LTS verzí linuxového jádra prodloužena ze dvou na šest let, ale počátkem loňského roku bylo toto prodloužení zrušeno.
articles.title: Google prodlužuje podporu linuxového jádra, aby zajistil delší bezpečnost pro Android

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Editor Zed je napsán v jazyce Rust, využívá akceleraci grafické karty a vytvořil ho jeden z původních autorů editoru Atom. Původně byl Zed vytvořen pro macOS a na začátku letošního roku byly otevřeny jeho zdrojové kódy. Uživatelé se proto logicky ptali, kdy bude Zed k dispozici také pro Linux. Vývojáři nyní oznámili, že je možné stahovat linuxovou verzi.
articles.title: Editor Zed je k dispozici pro Linux

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Zranitelnost označená jako CVE-2024–6409 (skóre CVSS: 7.0) ohrožuje některé verze OpenSSH a lze ji zneužít ke vzdálenému spuštění kódu (RCE). Tato zranitelnost se liší od nedávno zveřejněné chyby RegreSSHion, protože nyní zneužití probíhá v podřízeném procesu s nižšími právy.
articles.title: Zranitelnost OpenSSH může vést ke vzdálenému spuštění kódu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: V rámci Early Access Programu verze 2024.2 je k dispozici vývojová verze IDE založeného na IntelliJ od JetBrains, která disponuje nativním během na Waylandu. Jde o podporu experimentální, nicméně včetně běhu v rámci Windows Subsystem for Linux.
articles.title: JetBrains má preview verzi IntelliJ IDE s nativní podporou Waylandu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Další novinkou připravovanou pro zářijové vydání GNOME 47, je podpora převodu standardního sRGB zobrazení na HDR výstup, kterou nyní dostává Wayland kompozitor GNOME Mutter – v této souvislosti doplňme, že v GNOME / Fedoře se s X11 nepočítá, v rámci verze 41 i instalátor už přejde na Wayland.
articles.title: GNOME 47 dostane podporu transformace z sRGB na HDR výstup

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Snahy o portování otevřených ovladačů na nejznámější uzavřenou platformu se objevují celkem pravidelně. Nejnovější hackerský počin zkouší Faith Ekstrandová ze společnosti Collabora. Jejím cílem je portovat ovladač pro API Vulkan z balíku Mesa a pro AMD Radeony, tedy RADV, na Windows.
articles.title: RADV Mesa ovladač pro API Vulkan experimentálně na Windows

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: V rámci iniciativy GPUOpen vydala AMD novou verzi vývojářského kitu FidelityFX 1.1. Zahrnuje mimo jiné novější verzi upscalingu FidelityFX Super Resolution, tedy FSR 3.1, přidává pak dále dva nové prvky, knihovny Breadcrumbs a Brixelizer.
articles.title: AMD FidelityFX SDK 1.1 přináší lepší upscaling FSR 3.1

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: B.H.L.)
articles.description: Nadace pro svobodný software (Free Software Foundation) prosí o finanční podporu. Inflace řádí po celém světě a vzhledem k zvýšeným nákladům již není stávající financování Nadace pro svobodný software dostačující.
articles.title: Nadace pro svobodný software (FSF) prosí o finanční podporu

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Ať už horečně hledáte levnou cestu k postavení hového počítače, nebo jen chcete upgradovat stárnoucí kopii Office, tato kolekce nabídky od Goodoffer24.com vám pomůže. Jejich ceny jsou opravdu neuvěřitelné, tak na co čekat?
articles.title: Při výprodeji v akci Back to School je Microsoft Windows jen za €20 a Office za €24,50

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 28/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Vláda přerušila projednávání nového zákona o kybernetické bezpečnosti. Technologie baterií (2): Nová sodíková baterie se nabije za pár sekund. Proč budoucnost výrobního průmyslu spočívá v open source? Implementace Salesforce: České firmy ukazují cestu k digitální transformaci.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Vláda přerušila projednávání nového zákona o kybernetické bezpečnosti

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Trh NFT funguje podivně. Kvantový simulátor na superpočítači Karolina. Částici stop v CERNu nenašli, supersymetrii opět nepotvrdili. Čím lze na exoplanetách nahradit vodu?
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Neutrina zůstávají záhadou

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: 76 % firem zlepšilo svou kybernetickou ochranu, aby se kvalifikovalo pro kybernetické pojištění. AWS investuje do veřejného sektoru. Technologie baterií (1): Baterie lithium-kov by mohl vylepšit křemík. Útočníci stále častěji napadají firmy využívající provozní technologie. Celosvětové výdaje na digitální transformaci dosáhnou do roku 2027 téměř 4 bilionů dolarů.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Celosvětové výdaje na digitální transformaci dosáhnou do roku 2027 téměř 4 bilionů dolarů

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: V křemíkovém nebi končí další ostravský superpočítač. Temná hmota a primordiální černé díry se navzájem nevysvětlují. Astronomové se snaží vyřešit záhadu rentgenových dvojhvězd. Rotace vnitřního jádra Země se zpomalila.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Elektrony v grafenu mohou vytvářet zlomkové náboje

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 27/2024

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Výprodejní akce Back to School právě začíná. Jedna z webových stránek, která má nejlepší nabídku a je zároveň spolehlivá, je Goodoffer24.com, kde ceny opravdu vybočují, zvláště na operační systém Microsoft, ať už za současný nebo předešlý, a to jak za verze Pro nebo Home. S dalším exkluzivním kódem získáte další 30% slevu na můžete se radovat z doživotních licencí. Nebo, což je v podstatě stejné, zaplatíte jednou a můžete na problémy zapomenout.
articles.title: Normální cena za Windows 11 Pro je €259 ale Goodoffer24 účtuje jen €20

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Generativní umělá inteligence zvyšuje produktivitu softwarového inženýrství o 70 %. Uživatele nejspolehlivěji oklame phishingový e-mail o nezaplacené faktuře. Zdrojem narušení firemní infrastruktury jsou nejen e-maily a weby. Zapomíná se na externí média. 20 % českých firem čelilo v roce 2023 ransomwarovému útoku, výkupné zaplatilo 15 % napadených. AI Storage as-a-Service: Pure Storage pomáhá zákazníkům držet krok s rychlým vývojem umělé inteligence.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Uživatele nejspolehlivěji oklame phishingový e-mail o nezaplacené faktuře

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 26/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Kosmologická konstanta a energie vakua. Obří černá díra se probouzí přímo před zraky astronomů. Nová laboratoř v Řeži testuje originální technologii pro výrobu radionuklidu aktinium-225.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Realizovali kvantové provázání s nejtěžším kvarkem top

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Svobodná webová platforma pro sdílení a přehrávání videí PeerTube (Wikipedie) byla vydána v nové verzi 6.2. Přehled novinek i s náhledy v oficiálním oznámení a na GitHubu.
articles.title: PeerTube 6.2

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová stabilní verze 3.6 svobodného multiplatformního softwaru pro editování a nahrávání zvukových souborů Audacity (Wikipedie). Přehled novinek také na YouTube. Ke stažení je oficiální AppImage. Zatím starší verze Audacity lze instalovat také z Flathubu a Snapcraftu.
articles.title: Audacity 3.6

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Po necelých 4 měsících vývoje od vydání verze 6.5 byla vydána nová verze 6.6 svobodného open source redakčního systému WordPress. Kódové jméno Dorsey bylo vybráno na počest amerického jazzového trombonisty, trumpetisty, skladatele a dirigenta big band éry Tommyho Dorseyho (YouTube).
articles.title: WordPress 6.6 Dorsey

articles.author: Fluttershy, yay!
articles.description: 3D software Blender byl vydán ve verzi 4.2 s prodlouženou podporou.  Podrobnosti v poznámkách k vydání.
articles.title: Blender 4.2 LTS

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová verze 6.5 živé linuxové distribuce Tails (The Amnesic Incognito Live System), jež klade důraz na ochranu soukromí uživatelů a anonymitu. Přehled změn v příslušném seznamu. Tor Browser byl povýšen na verzi 13.5.1.
articles.title: Tails 6.5

articles.author: Fluttershy, yay!
articles.description: Správce sbírky fotografií digiKam byl vydán ve verzi 8.4.0. Jedná se o převážně opravné vydání provázené aktualizacemi knihoven. V minulé verzi přidané automatické štítkování podle obsahu obrázků (projekt z GSoC 2023) bylo doplněno o možnost strojového překladu štítků z angličtiny.
articles.title: digiKam 8.4.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byl představen SCALE, tj. GPGPU toolchain umožňující spouštění CUDA programů na GPU od AMD. Za projektem stojí společnost Spectral Compute.
articles.title: SCALE, GPGPU toolchain umožňující spouštění CUDA programů na GPU od AMD

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Retro PC emulátor UTM SE pro iPhone, iPad a Apple Vision Pro je nově zdarma k dispozici v App Storu (𝕏). UTM SE je postavený nad QEMU.
articles.title: Retro PC emulátor UTM SE nově zdarma k dispozici v App Storu

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Po 9 týdnech vývoje od vydání Linuxu 6.9 oznámil Linus Torvalds vydání Linuxu 6.10. Přehled novinek a vylepšení na LWN.net: první a druhá polovina začleňovacího okna. Později také na Linux Kernel Newbies.
articles.title: Linux 6.10

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: PCSX2 (Wikipedie), tj. emulátor herní konzole Sony PlayStation 2, byl vydán v nové major verzi 2.0 (𝕏, Mastodon). Přehled novinek i s náhledy v příspěvku na blogu.
articles.title: PCSX2 2.0

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Wlroots 0.18 recently debuted as the newest version of this Wayland library born out of the Sway compositor project. With wlroots 0.18 is support for new Wayland protocols and other exciting features...
articles.title: wlroots 0.18 Brings New Wayland Protocols & Support For GPU Reset Recovery

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Installing the NVIDIA proprietary graphics driver stack on Fedora currently doesn't jive with UEFI Secure Boot systems and can lead to the OS being unbootable. As such, the NVIDIA driver option was previously removed from GNOME Software. But as the NVIDIA driver is still widely sought after on Fedora by Linux gamers and those wanting to run CUDA/AI workloads especially, Fedora 41 is now cleared to roll-out NVIDIA driver support with UEFI Secure Boot integration...
articles.title: Fedora Will End Up Supporting The NVIDIA Driver With Secure Boot

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The AMD Secure Encrypted Virtualization (SEV) changes have been submitted for the recently opened Linux 6.11 merge window. Notable this cycle is getting support in the mainline kernel for SEV-SNP guest support over a Secure VM Service Module (SVSM)...
articles.title: AMD Advances Confidential Computing In Linux 6.11 With SEV-SNP + SVSM Guest Support

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The open-source LLVM compiler today dropped support for AMD's long forgotten 3DNow! instructions...
articles.title: LLVM Compiler Finally Ends Support For AMD's 3DNow!

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: For those running the popular, modular/upgradeable Framework Laptops, the Linux 6.11 kernel is bringing some nice driver additions for enhancing the support on the recent models...
articles.title: Linux 6.11 Adds ChromeOS EC LED Driver For The Framework Laptops

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Intel engineers have been busy preparing their open-source Linux software stack for H.266/VVC video decoding that is expected with upcoming Xe2 graphics for Lunar Lake and Battlemage. FFmpeg 2024Q2 is out today with VVC decoding now working on Intel graphics for this widely-used multimedia library...
articles.title: Intel FFmpeg 2024Q2 Update Enables GPU-Accelerated VVC Decoding

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Jens Axboe has seen all of the block subsystem and IO_uring changes already mainlined for the in-development Linux 6.11 kernel...
articles.title: Linux 6.11 Adds Support For Rust-Based Block Drivers & Atomic Writes

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: It's Blender 4.2 release day! Blender 4.2 marks the newest long-term support (LTS) release for this wonderful free software 3D modeling solution that has developed quite a following across the industry...
articles.title: Blender 4.2 LTS Released With GPU Accelerated Compositing, Intel OIDN On AMD GPUs

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While many have been excited around the prospects of laptops powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite SoC, the Linux support so far still leaves a lot to be desired... The initial Snapdragon X Elite laptops aren't utilizing ACPI standards and the bring-up under Linux has been slow, but patches have begun appearing for some models. But even with patches, the Adreno GPU remains a big obstacle still being tackled along with other features like web camera, USB4, Bluetooth, etc. With a new kernel patch, the GPU for the Snapdragon X Elite (X1E80100) is being disabled by default...
articles.title: Linux Patch To Disable The Snapdragon X Elite "X1E80100" GPU By Default

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: There's a new driver subsystem being introduced in the Linux 6.11 kernel for power sequencing...
articles.title: New Power Sequencing Driver Subsystem Merged For Linux 6.11

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: For the past year and a half Intel engineers have been working on Linux kernel improvements for Sub-NUMA Clustering (SNC) in the presence of Resource Director Technology (RDT). Intel has been advising its customers not to use Sub-NUMA Clustering when making use of Resource Director Technology since these features would effectively fight eachother. Well, with the Linux 6.11 kernel that's finally being addressed...
articles.title: Intel Sub-NUMA Clustering Will Stop Clashing With Resource Director On Linux 6.11+

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Stemming from a recent investigation into a GCC compiler regression on Zen 4, it was discovered that the unaligned load/store costs for the Zen 4 and Zen 5 targets were inaccurate and have now been tweaked within GCC Git...
articles.title: GCC Git Adjusts Unaligned Load/Store Costs For AMD Zen 4 & Zen 5

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Linus Torvalds began the Linux 6.11 merge window yesterday by merging some of his own feature code for this next kernel version...
articles.title: Linus Torvalds Begins The Linux 6.11 Merge Window By Merging Some Of His Own Code

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The Solus Linux project announced today they will be dropping the AppArmor patches carried by their kernels. In turn this means their Snap packaging support will only run with partial confinement...
articles.title: Solus Linux Dropping Support For AppArmor & Phasing Out Snaps

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While there have been various efforts like HIPIFY to help in translating CUDA source code to portable C++ code for AMD GPUs and then the previously-AMD-funded ZLUDA to allow CUDA binaries to run on AMD GPUs via a drop-in replacement to CUDA libraries, there's a new contender in town: SCALE. SCALE is now public as a GPGPU toolchain for allowing CUDA programs to be natively run on AMD graphics processors...
articles.title: New "SCALE" Software Allows Natively Compiling CUDA Apps For AMD GPUs

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Following last night's release of the Linux 6.10 kernel, the FSF LA developers have released GNU Linux-libre 6.10-gnu as their downstream kernel flavor that strips out the ability to load binary-only kernel modules and the ability to load non-free firmware/microcode into open-source drivers, among other alterations in the name of software freedom...
articles.title: GNU Linux-libre 6.10 Takes Aim At Intel IPU6, Panthor & Other Drivers With Blobs

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Last week I had the pleasure to be out in Los Angeles for the AMD Tech Day focused on their new Ryzen 9000 "Granite Ridge" and Ryzen AI 300 "Strix Point" processors. This was an exciting event with many new details shared around Zen 5 CPU cores and the RDNA 3.5 integrated graphics found with the upcoming Ryzen AI 300 series mobile processors. The embargo concerning those architectural details have now expired while the review/benchmarking embargo isn't until a later date.
articles.title: AMD Zen 5 Overview With Ryzen 9000 Series & Ryzen AI 300

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Alongside all of the exciting Ryzen 9000 and Ryzen AI 300 series details shared last week at the AMD Tech Day in Los Angeles, what I also found to be very interesting was AMD sharing a bit more about a "Unified AI Software Stack" they are working to release in the coming quarters...
articles.title: AMD Unified AI Software Stack Has The Potential To Be A Very Big Deal

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The Chrome platform changes for Linux 6.11 as code predominantly for enabling Chromebooks with the mainline Linux kernel is set to introduce two new drivers...
articles.title: Linux 6.11 Adding Fan Speed / Temperature & Charge Control Drivers For The ChromeOS EC

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Coming in as a rather late change proposal for Fedora 41 is to support self-encrypting drives from within the OS installer...
articles.title: Fedora 41 Aims To Support Self-Encrypting Drives Within Its Installer

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Bcachefs maintainer Kent Overstreet has already sent out all of the exciting Linux 6.11 feature updates for this copy-on-write file-system. Bcachefs continues maturing nicely within the mainline Linux kernel while continuing to tack on new functionality...
articles.title: Bcachefs For Linux 6.11 Landing Disk Accounting Rewrite & Self-Healing On Read I/O Error

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Among the flurry of pull requests submitted now that the Linux 6.11 merge window is open are the hardware monitoring (HWMON) subsystem updates...
articles.title: Hardware Monitoring Improvements Submitted For Linux 6.11

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Wine 9.13 was released on Sunday as off its usual bi-weekly Friday release regiment for this newest development build...
articles.title: Wine 9.13 Released - Continues Rewriting The CMD.EXE Engine

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: As anticipated the Linux 6.10 kernel was released as stable a few minutes ago by Linus Torvalds...
articles.title: Linux 6.10 Released With New Panthor Graphics Driver, Radeon Display Support On RISC-V

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: With Linux 6.10 expected to be released in the coming hours, in turn the Linux 6.11 merge window will open tomorrow unless there is any last-minute v6.10 release delay. With that said, here's a look at some of the features you can likely expect to see for this next kernel version...
articles.title: Linux 6.11 Features To Include A Lot For Intel & AMD Systems, Extensible Scheduler

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Arch Linux based CachyOS has released their "July 2024" release that also introduces an AMD Zen 4 optimized repository that caters to current Ryzen 7000/8000 and EPYC 4004/8004/9004 (Zen 4) procssors and upcoming Zen 5 processors...
articles.title: CachyOS Rolls Out Zen 4 Optimized Repository For Maximizing Zen 4 & Zen 5 Performance

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Linux engineer Christian Brauner at Microsoft sent out his various pull requests for areas of the kernel he oversees ahead of the Linux 6.11 merge window. One of the more interesting pull requests from Brauner this cycle are the "vfs procfs" updates that now allow restricting access to the /proc/[pid]/mem files of processes...
articles.title: Linux 6.11 To Allow Tightening Of /proc/[pid]/mem Access For Better Security

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While Fedora 41 isn't even out yet, early feature planning is already underway for Fedora 42 that will debut in the early months of 2025. One of the interesting proposals raised so far is for making use of the new DRM Panic screen functionality for a "Blue Screen of Death" of sorts for better presenting kernel error messages in case of kernel panics...
articles.title: Fedora 42 Looks To Make Use Of The "Screen Of Death" DRM Panic Screen

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Patches have been posted to the Linux kernel mailing list for getting various Lenovo devices supported by the mainline Linux kernel that rely on the Qualcomm MSM8916 and MSM8939 platforms...
articles.title: New Patches To Get More Qualcomm Lenovo Devices Supported By The Mainline Linux Kernel

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Linux 6.10 stable should be released later today. It's been a fairly calm week in the kernel world and thus Linus Torvalds will most likely opt for tagging v6.10 as opposed to doing a v6.10-rc8 extra release candidate. So with Linux 6.10 likely upon us, here's a reminder about some of the most interesting changes in this new kernel release...
articles.title: The Most Interesting Linux 6.10 Features From MSEAL To Intel Xe2 Preparations

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The alpha release of GNOME 47 is now available for testing and comes with a number of shiny new features for this big open-source desktop update due out in September...
articles.title: GNOME 47 Alpha Released With Accent Color Support & Wayland-Only Build Option

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: This week AWS announced that Graviton4 went into GA with the new R8G instances after Amazon originally announced their Graviton4 ARM64 server processors last year as built atop Arm Neoverse-V2 cores. I eagerly fired up some benchmarks myself and I was surprised by the generational uplift compared to Graviton3. At the same vCPU counts, the new Graviton4 cores are roughly matching Intel Sapphire Rapids performance while being able to tango with the AMD EPYC "Genoa" and consistently showing terrific generational uplift.
articles.title: AWS Graviton4 Benchmarks Prove To Deliver The Best ARM Cloud Server Performance

articles.author: Moulik Mathur
articles.description:
Epic Games has brought the High Seas to Fortnite, with the introduction of a Pirates of the Caribbean crossover. The new Cursed Sails event will arrive on July 19 in Fortnite, and the event pass will offer a Captain Jack Sparrow skin to players.


Fortnite's item shop will be hosting other characters from the Pirates of the Caribbean series, with the likes of Captain Barbossa, Davy Jones, a cute Little Kraken, and Elizabeth Swann all set to be added. 












Images via Epic Games



While all of these are confirmed skins, there is a lot more expected to arrive with this event. Popular leaker HypeX claims that the event pass will also offer a dead Captain Jack Sparrow version among other Pirates of the Caribbean rewards, as seen in the leaked image. A new Pirates of the Caribbean POI w…
articles.title: Fortnite Cursed Sails event skins, event pass rewards, new POI, and more

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The first server maintenance for EA Sports College Football 25 has been announced for July 17.


The college football simulator continues to make positive impressions among fans. While it's still in the early access period, EA Sports will conduct the maintenance. articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
It's been a decade since Hipster Whale first made a splash with the Frogger-style road-crossing mobile game Crossy Road. Its colorful characters eventually returned in 2020's Crossy Road Castle, and now they're hopping on across the road to consoles. 


The port will bring Crossy Road Castle to PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch sometime later in 2024. Ahead of that, there will be a public demo at BitSummit 2024, which takes place July 20-21 in Kyoto, Japan. You can refresh yourself on the perilous platforming at hand with the console announcement trailer below.




Sporting local and online multiplayer, Crossy Road Castle is a procedurally-generated platformer featuring 10 challenging towers and over 150 collectable characters and customization items. After hitting Apple Arcade as an exclusive in February 2020, it eventually found itself among the nominees for Destructoid's best mobile game of the year. 


Some tweaks have been made in the transition to new platforms. The UI has been overhauled for each version, and cross-platform multiplayer can be enjoyed between players on different consoles. Hipster Whale also promises a continuing schedule of regular content updates on consoles. These range from limited-time events with special levels to new character drops. 


After spending the past four years and some change on Apple Arcade around the world, it's nice to see Crossy Road Castle branch out further. It's easy to pick up regardless of skill level, and hopefully the move to new platforms will give it even more room to grow.

The post Crossy Road Castle crosses over to consoles later this year appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Crossy Road Castle crosses over to consoles later this year

articles.description:
In Hunter Era, your Family dictates which unique buff your character gets simply by being a member of the family. You'll want to pick a solid Family that way you're getting the extra little bit of a buff when adventuring through Hunter Era. We've put together this Hunter Era Family Tier List for Update 1 to compare all the provided buffs from every Family Clan in Hunter Era.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Hunter Era Family Tier List


In total, there are six Families in Hunter Era, each with their own unique buffs. There are also four rarities of Families: Common, Rare, Epic, and Legendary, each with its own chance of being rolled. However, despite the rarities, some of the Common Families can actually hold their own compared to others based on the buff. Here is our Hunter Era Family Tier List as of Update 1:


S Tier



Krueger - +10% Nen Damage (Rare | 29%)


Zoldyck - +15% Movement Speed, +7% Stamina Regen (Legendary | 1%)



A Tier



Netero - +10% EXP (Epic | 10%)


Bellam - +5 Stamina (Common | 60%)



B Tier



Paradinight - +10% Yen (Rare | 29%)


Ryodan - +5 Health (Common | 60%)



The two Families in the S Tier provide powerful in-combat buffs, especially the Kruger Family which increases your Nen Damage by 10%, meaning you should strive for one of these two families. In the A Tier, the Netero Family will give you +10% EXP meaning you will level faster, but overall it's a small increase and not very impactful, especially in the longer term. Finally, the two options in the B Tier are rather trivial and won't really impact your overall Hunter Era gameplay much if at all.

The post Hunter Era Family Tier List for Update 1 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Hunter Era Family Tier List for Update 1

articles.description:
Developer Focus Entertainment and publisher Saber Interactive have released a joint statement online after a full dev build of Warhammer 40,000 Space Marine 2 leaked online. The team began by acknowledging the "overwhelming support" from the community after the old build was leaked.


The development team said that “years of hard work, passion, and dedication” have been poured into the game so far, adding that it is “disheartening” that many of the secrets of the game have been spoiled.




The team revealed that the leaked build will be almost a year old by the time the game officially launches on September 9, 2024. Insider Gaming reports that the leaked build is around 75GB in size, and is dated February 23, 2024. The report also states that it may be possible for those who have obtained the game to play in the multiplayer mode.


“Our unwavering commitment has been to deliver the best possible game for our players. This was the driving force behind our decision to spend more time on development and ensure we deliver the best experience we can”, added Focus Entertainment in their statement.


The team is also pleading with the fans in their statement to avoid this leaked Space Marine 2 version as they said, “We’re asking everyone to avoid this unfinished build and to not spoil the game for those excited to experience it for the first time at launch.”


To conclude, Focus Entertainment reiterates that the best way to support their team’s hard work is to “play the game as they’ve always intended.”

The post Focus Entertainment responds after a playable build of Warhammer Space Marine 2 leaks online appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Focus Entertainment responds after a playable build of Warhammer Space Marine 2 leaks online

As Season 4 draws to a close, Activision unveiled yet another teaser for Season 5 with a new Warzone Superstore POI. Urzikstan map lovers can look forward to this latest feature on July 24, with the possible comeback of the STG-44. 


The Atlas Superstore brings forth a new hub where you can gather some much-needed materials. Though, it won't be as easy as checking out a few items at the counter, given that everyone will be gunning for this place. That just means you'll have to use the aisles to your advantage to get through here safely.




If you look closely at this Warzone Season 5 teaser, you may have noticed the sightings of the classic weapon, STG-44. This Assault Rifle has been a part of almost every CoD iteration, from Black Ops to Advanced Warfare. Although the gun was only shown briefly in the clip, it does seem to match the design from past entries.




The STG-44 also looks to have a much more modern design to complement the franchise's revamped graphics. It'll be curious to see how it will work in Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone Season 5. I, myself, would like to know if it will have the same submachine gun qualities as it did in the past.


On the other hand, it hasn't been officially confirmed that the STG-44 will make its return. Plus, the weapon in the teaser could be a completely different gun we are unaware of. But since there have been a few leaks floating around its comeback, it does seem plausible.


Image via Activision


More content for Warzone and MW3 Season 5 is expected to come soon. There's an upcoming WWE crossover on the horizon with potential new Operator skins. Mark your calendars for this launch on July 24 across all compatible platforms.

The Ruben Vargas Team of the Tournament SBC is now live in EA FC 24 Ultimate Team, featuring a beginner-friendly card.


The recent TOTT SBCs have been pretty expensive, having multiple squad requirements. Tonight's release is different from those, as it has only one squad requirement. Let's take a look at the conditions that you'll have to satisfy in order to obtain the card. 


EA FC 24 Ruben Vargas Team of the Tournament SBC tasks


The solo task is the main reason as to why beginners will love the Ruben Vargas Team of the Tournament SBC. The conditions look pretty easy to manage even if you don't have too much fodder in your club. 


Task 1 - Ruben Vargas



Min. 1 Players: Any TOTS or TOTW


Min. Team Rating: 85



I will use a TOTW item to complete this challenge. TOTS items are best…
articles.title: EA FC 24: How to complete Ruben Vargas Team of the Tournament SBC

articles.author: Marcus Stewart
articles.description:
The Xbox 360 digital store shuts down later this month on July 26. Amid a wave of price reductions and other end-of-life updates, nostalgic fans can relive the console's earliest days via a new dynamic background modeled after the old “Blades” interface.
For those too young to remember or didn’t get an Xbox 360 until years later, the Blades interface was the console's first dashboard design. It was the first thing players saw from the console’s launch in 2005 until it was updated to an entirely different interface in 2008. Navigating it felt smooth as butter, and some diehards still believe it's the best UI of any Xbox console. 
Although it's less detailed, and you can’t flip through the Blades of this dynamic background and hear that satisfying “whoosh” sound, it’s nice to see Microsoft acknowledge the 360's like this. Here’s how you to make the Blades your Xbox background:
Press the Xbox button on your controller to open the guide.
Navigate to Profile & system > Settings > General > Personalization > My background > Dynamic backgrounds.
Choose Xbox 360 Blades under Featured or Xbox dynamic backgrounds
Select the background art you want using the A button.
You can read more about the impending Xbox 360 store closure and final updates by visiting this Xbox Wire article.
articles.title: Xbox 360 ‘Blades’ Interface Returns As Dynamic Background Ahead Of Digital Store Closure

articles.author: Marcus Stewart
articles.description:
Dead by Daylight’s 8th-anniversary stream revealed a few big updates for the popular asymmetrical horror game. The most immediate is the addition of Lara Croft as the game’s latest crossover survivor along with the impending addition of the much-requested 2v8 mode. 
Tomb Raider Chapter
Lara Croft (the 2013 reboot version, specifically) joins DBD today, and though she lacks her pistols and bow, she sports three new perks highlighting her adventuring prowess. Here's an explanation of each per DBD's website:
Finesse: Your fast vaults are faster when healthy, with a cooldown after a successful use.
Hardened: When you open a Chest and cleanse or bless a Totem, Hardened activates for the duration of the Trial. From that point, every time you scream, you’ll instead reveal the Killer’s Aura.
Specialist: When you open or rummage through a Chest, gain 1 Token (up to 3). When you do a Great Skill Check, consume a Token to reduce the max required Generator progress.


2v8 Mode
On July 25, a new 2v8 multiplayer mode descends into the game. This pits two Killers against eight survivors in expanded versions of five classic maps. The number of generators has been doubled, and Survivors must now repair 8 out of 13 to escape. Captive Survivors are now sent directly into cages, and Survivor perks have been reworked into a new role system designed to encourage teamwork. 


Cross-Progression
Cross-progression is being implemented on July 22. This means players can now sync their progress across multiple owned versions of the game. Everything can be shared across any platform except for Switch, which has a few restrictions as you can see in the chart below. 
Today’s stream also revealed a new trailer and the release date for The Casting of Frank Stone, the single-player DBD game developed by Supermassive Games (Until Dawn, The Quarry). You can read all about that here.
articles.title: Dead By Deadlight Gets Lara Croft Survivor Today, 2v8 Mode And Cross Progression On The Way

articles.author: Marcus Stewart
articles.description:
The Casting of Frank Stone, Supermassive Games’ single-player narrative-driven horror game set in the Dead by Daylight universe, has a release date. This intriguing horror collaboration will arrive on September 3, and a new trailer provides a proper introduction of the main cast. 
Developed by Supermassive (Until Dawn, The Quarry) and published by Dead by Daylight developer Behaviour Interactive, The Casting of Frank Stone stars five teenagers – Christine Gordon, Jaime Rivera, Linda Castle, Robert Green, and Bonnie Rivera – who film their own horror movie in an abandoned steel mill. Unfortunately, this mill has ties to a notorious murderer named Frank Stone, and the youth’s innocent art project goes horribly wrong.


We still don’t know much about the narrative other than that it is set within the world of Dead by Daylight and takes place in the town of Cedar Mills during the summer of 1980. Gameplay-wise, The Casting of Frank Stone follows a similar blueprint to Supermassive’s previous horror titles in that it’s a choice-driven adventure where characters can be permanently killed off based on your decisions. You can check out a recent gameplay trailer here to see it in action. 
The Casting of Frank Stone is coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC.
articles.title: The Casting Of Frank Stone Terrorizes Players This September

articles.author: Marcus Stewart
articles.description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 launches in October, but players can get in early via a pair of open betas. Activision is running two of these beta periods during consecutive weekends, and the dates and times for each have been revealed. 
Here is when you can jump into each beta: 
Weekend 1: Early Access (for preorder customers/Xbox Game Pass subscribers) - August 30 at 10 a.m. PT to September 4 at 10 a.m. PT
Weekend 2: Open Beta (for everyone) - September 6 at 10 a.m. PT to September 9 at 10 a.m. PT
Both betas are multiplayer only and will feature several online modes, weapons, equipment, and perks for players to tinker with. 
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 launches on October 25 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC. Set in 1991 during the Gulf War, the espionage-themed campaign centers on a mysterious organization's infiltration of the U.S. government. The Black Ops agents must go rogue to stop this threat, which takes players across the globe with new faces and returning favorites like Woods and Adler. You can learn more about the game by checking out our Summer Game Fest preview here.
articles.title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 Multiplayer Weekend Betas Announced

articles.author: Wesley LeBlanc
articles.description:
During my visit to BioWare in its Edmonton, Canada, office earlier this year for the current Game Informer cover story on Dragon Age: The Veilguard, I heard a sentiment repeated throughout the day from the game's leads: in past Dragon Age games, BioWare stumbled onto great companions, but with Veilguard, it's the first game where the studio feels it purposefully and intentionally created great companions. As such, those companions are key to everything happening in Veilguard. 
With such a significant emphasis on these characters, I spoke to some of the game's leads to learn precisely about BioWare's philosophy on companions in Veilguard. 


"No, that is the case," BioWare general manager Gary McKay tells me when I ask if he agrees with the stumbled-onto-greatness sentiment. "I would first …
articles.title: A Deep Dive Into BioWare's Companion Design Philosophy In Dragon Age: The Veilguard

articles.author: Marcus Stewart
articles.description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed, the video game follow-up to last year’s TMNT: Mutant Mayhem animated film, has its first trailer and a release date. The game was first announced last September. 
A Heartful of Games is developing the game, which retains the stylized Spider-Verse-inspired art direction from the hit film. The story unfolds after the movie's events and sees Leo, Raph, Donny, and Mikey battling a new wave of mutants invading New York City. 


As previously covered in our exclusive preview earlier this year, Mutant Mayhem is a third-person action/platformer game, and each turtle features a unique playstyle. The game also supports up to two-player local co-op. 
TMNT: Mutants Unleashed launches on October 18 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC. The game is also getting a fancy Collector Edition, and you can see the contents of that here. Mutants Unleashed is one of several TMNT games to arrive in recent years (and the third in 2024 alone, following Wrath of the Mutants and the Switch port of Splintered Fate), and you can read all about the franchise’s history in video games in our in-depth retrospective.
articles.title: TMNT: Mutant Mayhem Gets First Trailer And October Launch Date

articles.author: Marcus Stewart
articles.description:
Mortal Kombat 1’s final Year 1 DLC fighter arrives next week, and it’s Takeda Takahashi. The young Shirai Ryu warrior makes only his second appearance in a Mortal Kombat game and looks every bit as capable as his older clanmates, Scorpion and Smoke. 
Although Takeda was Kenshi’s son in his debut appearance, Mortal Kombat X, the remixed timeline of Mortal Kombt 1 has changed him to Kenshi’s cousin. Like Kenshi, Takeda grew up a Yakuza but was more faithful to the clan than his cousin. As such, the Yakuza tasked Takeda with killing Kenshi, and the two battled, with the latter coming emerging victorious. Takeda was mortally wounded in the battle and rushed to the aid of the Shirai Ryu, where Kenshi protected him from being killed by the Yakuza for failing his mission. This causes Takeda to have a change of heart and join the Shirai Ryu to wage war against Earthrrealm’s criminal underground and, eventually, the evil forces of Outworld. 
Takeda still utilizes the Shirai Ryu fighting style, including his signature pair of bladed whips. He also sports shurikens, a barrage of teleporting flame attacks, and an aerial grapple best described as mid-air corkscrew piledriver. Check Takeda out below.  


Takeda will be available on July 23, both as a standalone purchase and as a free download for Kombat Pack owners. The same day also sees previously revealed Kameo fighter Ferra become available to buy. Both Takeda and Ferra will be playable for the first time during Evo 2025 this weekend. 
For more on Mortal Kombat 1, check out our review as well as the trailers for previous DLC fighters Homelander, Omni-Man, Ermac, Peacemaker, and Quan-Chi.
articles.title: Takeda Joins The Mortal Kombat 1 Roster Next Week, First Gameplay Revealed

articles.author: Wesley LeBlanc
articles.description:
Crocs and Pokémon are teaming up again for another collaboration, this time bringing four classic Generation 1 pocket monsters into the shoe line sometime this year. This news comes by way of Sole Retriever, which reports that Crocs is releasing four new pairs of shoes, each themed after a specific Kanto Pokémon: Charizard, Gengar, Snorlax, and Jigglypuff. 
Though there isn't a release date for these Crocs yet – Sole Retriever simply reports 2024 – we know each will cost $70. While each pair has unique theming based on the Pokémon it's representing, each pair of Crocs comes with Jibbitz, which are the detachable charms on the tops of the shoes, the classic Pokémon title on back of the shoe strap, and the classic Pokéball logo as the buttons holding each of the straps in place. 
Charizard

Gengar

Snorlax

Jigglypuff

Sole Retriever says these Crocs will be available through Crocs and online and in-store retailers. 
While waiting to learn more, read about an upcoming Nike x Tekken 8 shoe collaboration.
[Source: Sole Retriever]
Are you interested in picking up any of these Crocs? Let us know in the comments below!
articles.title: Crocs And Pokémon Are Teaming Up Again With Four New Gen 1 Shoes

articles.author: Kyle Hilliard
articles.description:
Concord is in beta this weekend and Alex Van Aken and I decided to jump in, play a few rounds, and figure out which characters we liked from the impressive roster. Together we discovered that Lennox, the hot sauce eating green man seen in the game's trailer shouts "exploding knife!" when he throws his exploding knife, but he had nothing on It-Z who had a great SMG, the ability to clone herself when she dodges, and teleportation ability making her easily and indisputably the best character in the game. Alex also liked Duchess. You can check out the archive of the full stream below.


For a while lot more on Concord, which releases on PlayStation 5 and PC August on August 23, head here to read about how it plays like Destiny meets Overwatch.
To watch more of our livestreams, video podcasts, and series such as Super Replay, be sure to visit and subscribe to our second YouTube channel, Game Informer Shows. Head over to our flagship Game Informer YouTube channel for more previews, reviews, and discussions of new and upcoming games.
articles.title: Finding The Best Characters In The Concord Beta | GI Live

In its fifth major expansion, Dawntrail, Final Fantasy XIV is facing its biggest existential crisis yet: where does your story go now that its 10-year A-plot is over? Dawntrail forges ahead with an enjoyable summer adventure to the land of Tural, doubling as a trojan horse for what lies in store for the future of the long-running MMO’s story. Dawntrail doesn’t match the narrative highs of the previous pair of expansions and is flawed in several ways, but its themes of legacy, the importance of culture, and responsible…
articles.title: Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail Review - Shonen Summer Sojourn

articles.author: Kyle Hilliard
articles.description:
Nintendo added three new games to its Game Boy Advance Nintendo Switch Online library, and though none of the them are Mother 3 (or a Pokémon game or Astro Boy or Drill Dozer or any other GBA game we've been clamoring for) they are none-the-less interesting and completely unexpected.
Starfy isn't a particularly familiar franchise to America players. They have received four games – three for Game Boy Advance, one for DS – but only the 2009 DS game ever released in America. Today, the original three Game Boy Advance games are now available for Nintendo Switch Online subscribers. The games retain their original title, Densetsu no Stafy, and have not been localized. The gameplay has been describe as Kirby-esque, but I have never been able to confirm that myself until today.


Are you planning on booting up these classic-outside-of-America platformers?
articles.title: Three Never-Released-In-America Game Boy Advance Starfy Games Are Available Now For Nintendo Switch Online

articles.author: Alex Van Aken
articles.description:
In this week's episode of The Game Informer Show, the crew attempts to highlight the best games of 2024 that have launched between January and July. This is not all-encompassing. Rather, it's more a conversation about this year's early standouts and other releases we plan to visit before our official Game of the Year discussions in December. Before we properly dive in, Marcus breaks down his review of Anger Foot, developer Free Lives' new first-person shooter. Afterwards, Alex highlights a small desktop game (literally) called Rusty's Retirement. We hope you enjoy this episode and find new games to play!
Watch the Video Version:


Follow us on social media: Alex Van Aken (@itsVanAken), Kyle Hilliard (@KyleMHilliard), Marcus Stewart (@MarcusStewart7)

Matt Storm, the freelance audio editor for The Game Informer Show, edited this episode. Matt is an experienced podcast host and producer who's been speaking into a microphone for over a decade.       PC
      
Platform:

Developer:
